name: Chicken or Hell
description:
Game made by me and my team in the Global Game Jam of 2021 site of the project will come below.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/chicken-or-hell-what-came-first-8

You are a Chicken: your egg was stolen! Explore the way through the slums to find the one who stole it and retrieve your precious egg! Jump, bounce, find secret passages, don't let yourself drown in the slums nasty water. Will you be able to find your egg?
